translation.it: Andavo in autobus da Ginevra a Gstaad,

translation.en: and the bus driver was introducing as if we are tourists.
translation.it: e l'autista ci descriveva i dintorni come a dei normali turisti.

translation.en: "You'll be passing a lake. This lake is called Chopra Lake."
translation.it: "State per vedere un lago, di nome Lago Chopra".

translation.en: -Little knowing Chopra is sitting… -[Karan] That it was named after you.
translation.it: - Non sapendo che Chopra… - Era accanto a lui.

translation.en: -The ambassador of Interlaken. -[applause]
translation.it: L'ambasciatore di Interlaken.

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.it: Grazie.

translation.en: [Yash] Then I'd like to thank all my stars, technicians, workers
translation.it: Vorrei ringraziare tutti i miei attori, i tecnici e gli addetti

translation.en: who have worked with me for so long, such a long time
translation.it: che hanno lavorato con me per così tanto tempo

translation.en: to achieve this success and this new life to Yash Raj Films unit.
translation.it: per raggiungere questo successo e questa nuova vita per la Yash Raj Films.

translation.en: [Tanul] You get the sense that Yash Chopra and the production house itself
translation.it: Fu come se Yash Chopra e la sua casa di produzione

translation.en: is rising from the ashes.
translation.it: fossero rinati dalle ceneri.

translation.en: That it has started to come into being.
translation.it: Stava rinascendo.

translation.en: Uh, there are different other changes. Even at…
translation.it: Ci furono tanti altri cambiamenti.

translation.en: Both at the personal and the professional level.
translation.it: A livello personale e professionale.

translation.en: This young man called Aditya Chopra has, uh, has just begun his career.
translation.it: Un giovane uomo di nome Aditya Chopra era all'inizio della sua carriera.

translation.en: [interviewer] Did you have an inkling that Adi would grow up to be a director?
translation.it: Immaginavi che Adi potesse diventare un regista?

translation.en: [Abhishek] Uh, of course.
translation.it: Certamente.

translation.en: That wasn't even a discussion.
translation.it: Non c'era alcun dubbio.

translation.en: I mean, that was just… I don't even remember thinking about it.
translation.it: Non ricordo di avere mai pensato il contrario.

translation.en: 'Cause you just knew that Adi was… That's all, his world was cinema.
translation.it: Perché Adi era… Il suo mondo era il cinema.

translation.en: [Hrithik] I was sure that, uh, that he would be a filmmaker.
translation.it: Ero certo che avrebbe fatto cinema.

translation.en: But I think he's gone much beyond that.
translation.it: Ma credo che sia andato molto oltre.

translation.en: I think he's not just a filmmaker now.
translation.it: Penso che non sia più un semplice regista.

translation.en: I think he's, uh, he's a creator of cinema in a larger sense.
translation.it: Lo ritengo un creatore di cinema in senso più ampio.

translation.en: He's on the forefront of our industry.
translation.it: È in prima linea nel nostro settore.

translation.en: I… I tried to interview Adi when I first started
translation.it: All'inizio della mia carriera, provai a intervistare Adi

translation.en: and of course that didn't go anywhere.
translation.it: ma ovviamente non ci riuscii.

translation.en: [interviewer] What is the deal? Why is he so reclusive?
translation.it: Ma come mai? Perché è così solitario?

translation.en: Anti-social? I've no clue.
translation.it: Asociale? Non ne ho idea.

translation.en: I have a clue, but I'm not going to tell you that. [laughs]
translation.it: In realtà ho un'idea, ma non ve la dirò.

translation.en: He's very, very private.
translation.it: Tiene moltissimo alla privacy.

translation.en: He hates going out, he hates, uh, promoting his own movies,
translation.it: Odia le uscite pubbliche e la promozione dei suoi film.

translation.en: he hates it. He just wants to be left alone.
translation.it: Vuole essere lasciato in pace.

translation.en: I… I think, uh, Adi is very clear.
translation.it: Credo che Adi sia molto chiaro.

translation.en: "I want to write a story, and I want to make a film."
translation.it: "Voglio scrivere una storia e renderla un film.

translation.en: "When I'm not writing a story or making a film,
translation.it: Quando non scrivo e non giro un film,

translation.en: I want to help others write a story, and make a film as a producer."
translation.it: voglio aiutare gli altri a farlo, come produttore".

translation.en: [Kajol] Don't be so shy, now come on.
translation.it: Non fare il timido, vieni.

translation.en: Adi, come on.
translation.it: Adi, muoviti.

translation.en: Don't be so camera-conscious, okay?
translation.it: Non pensare alla telecamera, ok?

translation.en: [Karan] How do you feel, Adi?
translation.it: Come ti senti, Adi?

translation.en: [Kajol] Adi! Aditya Chopra, the great director.
translation.it: Adi! Aditya Chopra, il grande regista.

translation.en: The one and only genius of Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
translation.it: Il genio di Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge

translation.en: is right now limping out the door. [chuckles]
translation.it: sta letteralmente scappando.

translation.en: Is Adi going to talk to you or no?
translation.it: Con voi Adi parlerà o no?

translation.en: [interviewer] Would it, uh, surprise you, if I told you that
translation.it: La sorprenderebbe se le dicessi

translation.en: he shot with us extensively, like, he gave us--
translation.it: che l'abbiamo intervistato, e lui…

translation.en: What?
translation.it: Cosa?

translation.en: -He'll be on camera? -[interviewer] Yeah.
translation.it: - Si fa vedere? - Sì.

translation.en: What are you saying?
translation.it: Sul serio?

translation.en: He's never given… [laughs]
translation.it: Non ha mai dato…

translation.en: That's a big one. That's a big one!
translation.it: È clamoroso!

translation.en: Adi even came to my wedding, like, covering his face.
translation.it: Adi venne al mio matrimonio coprendosi il viso.

translation.en: [reporter 1] Will Aditya Chopra finally make a public appearance?
translation.it: Aditya Chopra farà un'apparizione pubblica?

translation.en: [reporter 2] The reclusive director Aditya Chopra…
translation.it: Il solitario regista Aditya…

translation.en: [reporter 3] Aditya Chopra…
translation.it: ADITYA CHOPRA E RANI MUKERJI A CENA INSIEME

translation.en: [reporter 4] Aditya Chopra is very shy
translation.it: Aditya Chopra è molto timido

translation.en: and does not like to be clicked by paparazzi.
translation.it: e non vuole essere fotografato dai paparazzi.

translation.en: Has Aditya finally decided [in Hindi] to be photographed?
translation.it: Aditya ha finalmente deciso di farsi fotografare?

translation.en: [in English] I can't believe it.
translation.it: Non posso crederci.

translation.en: I can hardly believe that he actually sat in front of the camera
translation.it: Stento a credere che abbia davvero parlato

translation.en: and expressed himself.
translation.it: davanti a una telecamera.

translation.en: He hates it.
translation.it: Odia farlo.

translation.en: What was his last interview, like, 20 years ago? I don't know.
translation.it: La sua ultima intervista risalirà a 20 anni fa, credo.

translation.en: [laughing] Jeez!
translation.it: Cavolo!

translation.en: You should… You should sell that for a lot of money.
translation.it: Dovreste fare tanti soldi con il video.

translation.en: I would buy it off you.
translation.it: Lo comprerei io stesso.

translation.en: It's… it's the beginning of a new era then, I think.
translation.it: È l'inizio di una nuova era, penso.

translation.en: It's a new chapter in life.
translation.it: Un nuovo capitolo della sua vita.

translation.en: Well done, guys, congratulations.
translation.it: Bravissimi, congratulazioni.

translation.en: I think, that, that… Wrap. Interview's done.
translation.it: Credo… Stop. Intervista finita.

translation.en: [man] Okay, let's go, guys.
translation.it: Ok, andiamo, ragazzi.
